attributes.title: Awful
attributes.review: This app took about 2 hours to download and was just in general was terrible, it should be more simple and it implanted a virus in my phone, erasing all my photos videos and downloaded apps. I would not recommend this app because you will most likely get a virus from it.

attributes.title: this app reeked havoc upon my household
attributes.review: first, the app took 43 years to download. once it finally downloaded a terrible noise began playing out of my home sound system. the noise sent all of my cats in to a frenzy. they began foaming at the mouth and attacking us in a feral manner. this was only the beginning of the tragedies. next, as my brother was attempting to fix the sound system, he went into a zombie like state. he and the feral cats began to eat each other. long story short, by the end of this horrible, day long catastrophe i had 3 less cats and a brother in an asylum.

attributes.title: Life Changing
attributes.review:
I downloaded this app after being persuaded by all my white male counterparts at work. I was hesitant given the facts but caved in due to peer pressure. 

Wish I would have known what it was and what it would do because as soon as I downloaded it, I grew a beard, a mullet, and a confederate flag appeared in my right hand that I now canâ€™t get rid of. I quit my job and spend my free time looking for people to get arrested or deport. I also somehow hate wearing masks. The sheer thought makes my blood boil. 

I was born a girl. 

Minus four stars because my breasts were really nice.
